targets.expr: sum(node_total_hourly_cost * 720)
sum(node_total_hourly_cost * 24)

targets.legendFormat: Relative price now vs 7d ago (Hour Price)

targets.expr:
1 - (
  avg(sum(node_total_hourly_cost))
/
  avg_over_time(
    sum(node_total_hourly_cost) [1d:1h]
  )
)
targets.legendFormat: Relative price now vs 1d ago (Hour Price)

panels.title: Relative price now vs (7/1)d ago (Hour Price)

targets.expr:
topk( 10, 
  sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (exported_namespace,exported_instance) * on(exported_instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * 730
				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (exported_namespace,exported_instance) * on(exported_instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	) * 730) by (exported_namespace)
)

topk( 10, 
  sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (exported_container,exported_instance) * on(exported_instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * 730
				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (exported_container,exported_instance) * on(exported_instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (exported_container)
)

topk( 20,

				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
					label_replace
					(

					) * 0
			)
  +

		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (exported_container)
)

targets.expr:
1 - (

avg_over_time(

  sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace,container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace,container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (namespace) [1d:1h]
            )
            
            /
            
avg_over_time(

  sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace,container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
					label_replace
